QuestData.Title: Reap What We Have Sown
QuestData.Description:
We told the constructor that we will use the Foundry to reset this land.
We must stop it and protect the new automa.
QuestData.RewardText:
Learning about new creatures that are infused with living growth--well, that sounds right up my alley!
I think I'll stay with them and see how I can help... and maybe pick up their language as well.
Thanks for coming on this adventure with me, friend!
